name: Busy King
description:
How to play
  • Control the king with the arrow keys
  • Your to-do list goes down while you're in your office alone
  • If a subject starts following you, bring them back to the room they started in to get rid of them
Game features
  • Fast-paced arcade gameplay reminiscent of Pac-Man
  • Requires strategy to decide when to hide, when to drop off subjects, and when to visit the office
  • Created for Ludum Dare 22 with the theme "alone"
Credits
  • Design, code, art by Rose Abernathy
  • Made with FlashPunk
